interactivity.requirements: 5 Kirin Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " See You in the Morning " Seen " Partners in Crime " from Kirin Kanda
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Call Kirin during the night after all Requirements have been fulfilled.

progression.synopsis: Sensei meets Karin out in the city. She says that the two of them aren't very different, being "just in this to have a good time", but Sensei wonders if that's really true. If he had an encounter with Kirin and Ayane during their beach vacation, he raises it with her â€” she gets angry when he doesn't show the "right" reactions, and tells him that she isn't obliged to explain herself or let herself be "fixed". Kirin says that Sensei's desire to figure her out is boring, and that they should make out instead, but Sensei tells her that he has to go.
trivia: There is variation in the dialogue depending on if Sensei saw Prisoner : Sensei will hesitate before calling Kirin. Sensei and Kirin will argue about her treatment of Ayane .
Sensei will hesitate before calling Kirin.
Sensei and Kirin will argue about her treatment of Ayane .

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.9p2.
